content.rendered:
Awards & Prizes

Junior Division

FIRST PRIZE: $3,000

SECOND PRIZE: $2,000

THIRD PRIZE: $1,000

Senior Division

FIRST PRIZE: $10,000
Airfare and accommodation to compete in the Preliminary Round
of the 17th International F. Chopin Competition
A series of concerts 

SECOND PRIZE: $7,500
Airfare and accommodation to compete in the Preliminary Round
of the 17th International F. Chopin Competition

THIRD PRIZE: $5,000
Airfare and accommodation to compete in the Preliminary Round
of the 17th International F. Chopin Competition
